Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.nmpi.model

Class DateTimeSerialiser

java.lang.Object
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializer<T>
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ser.std.StdSerializer<DateTime>
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.nmpi.model.DateTimeSerialiser
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonFormatVisitable, SchemaAware, Serializable
public class DateTimeSerialiser
extends StdSerializer<DateTime>
Simple serialiser for ISO 8601 dates, as Java likes them to be.
